column4: hello guys :-) can anyone recommend a reliable USB soundcard that works with ubuntu don;t want to spend too much :-)
any reason why it needs to be usb? and why you aren't just using your onboard sound card?
your onboard card doesn't do 5.1?  pretty much every onboard soundcard made in the past 10 years or so does 5.1
so go grab an old cheap sblive or something
